system.requirement: Your boar is an aggressive fighter.

abilities.description: Gore: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} alongside your boar and score a hit, inflict +1 harm and take +1 momentum.

Charge: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +iron by having your boar knock down your foe of formidable or less, you may reroll any die.

Truffle Snuffle: When you encourage your boar to follow the scent of truffles, you may @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.8d90dd472856be27]{Resupply} with +heart (instead of +wits). If you do, take +1 supply or +1 momentum on a strong hit.
